# bayesrules

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

bayesrules is a package to supplement the Bayes Rules! book. It contains datasets and functions that are used in the book. Currently it is under development. It is current purpose is to supplement our teaching of Bayesian courses as we continue to write our book.

## Installation

You can install the development version from Github. You would also need to install the devtools package if you do not have it installed already.

``` r
#install.packages("devtools") 
install.packages("mdogucu/bayesrules")
```
